articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Message from Chinese Leaders
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Message from Chinese Leaders
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un, Kim Yong Nam and Choe Yong Rim received a reply message from Hu Jintao, general-secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, Wu Bangguo, chairman of the Standing Committee of the Chinese National People's Congress, and Wen Jiabao, premier of the State Council, on Tuesday.
					 The message said:
					
					 We express our sincere thanks for your warm congratulations on the 63rd anniversary of the People's Republic of China.
					
					 The traditional Sino-DPRK friendship is a precious treasure common to both peoples as it was forged and cultivated with care by the leaders of the elder generation of the two countries.
					
					 It is our belief that under the new situation and in the new era the Sino-DPRK friendship would make fresh and steady development full of new dynamism and vitality and bring the peoples of the two countries greater wellbeing.
					
					 We wish the DPRK fresh and steady successes in all fields.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Delegation of Kyodo News
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Delegation of Kyodo News 
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Friday met and had a talk with the visiting delegation of Kyodo News headed by President Satoshi Ishikawa at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.

articles.title: Kyodo News Delegation Visits Different Places
articles.content:
Kyodo News Delegation Visits Different Places 
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Kyodo News of Japan led by President Satoshi Ishikawa visited the Pyongyang Folk Park on Friday. 
					 The guests went round different parts of the park, which was built thanks to the noble intention and patriotic devotion of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 They were deeply impressed to learn that working people and youth and students acquire wide knowledge and have cultural and emotional rest at the park which comprehensively deals with the history of the Korean nation spanning 5,000 years and which was built in such a way as to meet the principle of historicism and cater to the contemporary aesthetic taste.
					
					 At the end of the visit the head of the delegation said that the visit to the park offered an opportunity to know well about the history of the Korean nation. 
					
					 They also visited the Party Founding Memorial Tower. 
					
					 Watching the tower depicting a hammer, sickle and writing  brush and stylobate and others, they learned about the greatness of the peerlessly great men who developed the Workers' Party of Korea into a powerful guiding force of Songun revolution and an experienced and dignified mother party. 
					
					They toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the National Gifts Exhibition House, etc.

articles.title: Anniversary of Revolutionary Schools in Pyongyang Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Revolutionary Schools in Pyongyang Marked 
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School here marked their 65th anniversary.
					 The 65-year-long history of the revolutionary schools is associated with the wise leadership of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu and warm love shown by them. They founded the Juche-oriented idea and tradition of education of the bereaved children of the revolutionary martyrs and devoted their all to the work for bringing them up to be successors to the revolutionary cause. 
					
					 A meeting for celebrating the anniversary of the schools took place at the April 25 House of Culture Friday.
					
					 Present there were senior party, state and army officials including Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol and Kim Kyong Hui, anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters, teaching staff and cadets of the revolutionary schools and their graduates.
					
					 The letter sent by Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Marshal Kim Jong Un "Children of Revolutionary Martyrs Should Become Dependable Backbone of Songun Revolution that Gives Steady Continuity to Bloodline of Mangyongdae, Bloodline of Mt. Paektu" was conveyed at the meeting. 
					
					Kim Jong Un sent this letter to the teaching staff and cadets of the revolutionary schools on the 65th anniversary of the schools.
					
					 Resolutions were expressed at the meeting. 
					
					 O Ryong Thaek, principal of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School, and other speakers said that the letter serves as important guidelines to be held fast to in the education of the children of the revolutionary martyrs at present when the work to carry out the revolutionary cause of Juche has entered a new historical phase. 
					
					 It also serves as a militant banner encouraging the struggle for the final victory of the great Paektusan power, they noted. 
					
					 There are many children whose revolutionary parents laid down their lives in the struggle for the liberation, freedom and independence, prosperity and development of their countries and nations in the world, but the world knows no such bereaved children as those of Songun Korea who lead the most worthwhile and fruitful life under deep care of the great leaders and great party, the speakers stressed. 
					
					 They renewed their pledge to take the lead in the sacred struggle to carry forward and accomplish the Juche revolutionary cause, Songun revolutionary cause started on Mt. Paektu in hearty response to the historic letter.

articles.title: 12th People's Sports Contest Opens
articles.content:
12th People's Sports Contest Opens
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The 12th People's Sports Contest of the DPRK opened with due ceremony at Kim Il Sung Stadium on Friday.
					 The contest is divided into groups of sports teams and amateur sports. The participants will compete in various events such as football, basketball, volleyball, table-tennis, tennis, field and track to be held in Pyongyang and in various local areas.
					
					 Present there were Vice Premier Kim Yong Jin, Ri Yong Su, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, officials of ministries and national institutions, sports persons and working people.
					
					 Kim Yong Jin said in his congratulatory speech that the contest of this year will mark an occasion of powerfully demonstrating the unshakable resolution of all the participants to glorify the leadership feats performed by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in developing sports and build a sports power, true to the noble intention of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Minister of Physical Culture and Sports Pak Myong Chol in his opening speech underscored the need to raise a hot wind of sports across the country with the contest as a momentum and called upon all the players to set fresh records and fresh standard by fully displaying in matches the technique they have cultivated in day-to-day trainings.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants watched air stunts and demonstration performance of model aircraft players and parachutists.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Slams Traitor Lee Myung Bak's Anti-DPRK Remarks
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Slams Traitor Lee Myung Bak's Anti-DPRK Remarks
 Pyongyang, October 12 ((KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea Friday issued its information bulletin No. 1012. The bulletin said:
					 Traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea is now being cursed and censured at home and abroad for going reckless, letting loose a spate of malignant invectives against the DPRK.
					
					 In a "policy speech made at the National Assembly," the last one, on Oct. 4 Lee blustered that "the north's nuclear and missile development is unpardonable and south Korea is ready to cope with enemy's provocation".
					
					 On Oct. 8 Lee invited riff-raffs of the ultra-rightist Association of Reservists to a party in Chongwadae at which he slandered the DPRK as a "belligerent rival". He went the lengths of blaring that "a new wind of opening" has reached somewhere. 
					
					 His reckless remarks are nothing but the last hysteria of confrontation maniac steeped in bitterness towards the DPRK and a jargon of an old man more dead than alive fated to meet a miserable doom.
					
					 Lee is condemned by all the fellow countrymen for having committed all sorts of worst evils in the whole period of his office. He, however, dared slander the DPRK, not knowing where he stands. This provokes side-splitting laughter.
					
					 What he has done during his office is that he blocked the advance of the June 15 era through his frantic moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK, brought the inter-Korean relations to a collapse though they had favorably developed, and intensified maneuvers for a war in league with foreign forces, disturbing peace on the Korean Peninsula and driving the situation to the brink of a war.
					
					 The Lee group's announcement of "the missile guidance agreement" aimed at mounting a preemptive attack on the DPRK some days ago, in particular, clearly proves that the group's moves for invading the north have gone beyond a danger line. 
					
					 Nevertheless, he asserted he "stands for south-north relations of co-existence and co-prosperity" while talking about someone's "provocation". This is the height of shamelessness.
					
					 Worse still, he turned south Korea into a tundra of human rights and democracy through his unprecedented fascist repression and unpopular rule and threw people's living into destitution. He, however, dared talk about someone's "opening". This fully revealed symptoms of doom of a psychopath. 
					
					 The desperate accusations made by Lee against the DPRK are nothing but his last attempt to give vent to his indignation at the bottomless quagmire into which he has been thrown, standing isolated at home and abroad for the total failure of his policy for confrontation with the DPRK and unprecedentedly unpopular rule. This is, at the same time, a foolish attempt to save his face through confrontation hysteria as he has become a target of the special prosecution's investigation into the scandals disclosed in the last period of his office though he talked a lot about "moral regime" from the outset of his office.
					
					 Now he is running the whole gamut of base intrigues to incite confrontation with fellow countrymen with the "presidential election" just at hand in a bid to stimulate the morale of the conservative forces on the wane and help the "Saenuri Party" stay in power and thus escape a prison life after his ouster.
					
					 All the fellow countrymen have already passed a death sentence on Lee, the fascist dictator, confrontation maniac and traitor.
					
					 The more desperately Lee is resorting to confrontation with the DPRK to prolong his dirty remaining days, the stronger their hatred and resistance will grow and the more merciless judgment history will mete out to him.
					
					 There is no room for Lee to stay on this land.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Meets French Political Personage
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Meets French Political Personage
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), met and had a talk with Maurice Cukierman, international secretary of the C.C., the French Revolutionary Communist League (FRCL), who paid a courtesy call on Friday. 
					 At the talk the international secretary requested Kim Yong Il to convey heartfelt salute of the general secretary of the Central Committee of the FRCL and himself to the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He said he deemed it honor to enjoy the concert given by the Moranbong Band in the presence of Kim Jong Un on the 67th anniversary of the WPK. 
					
					 I was greatly encouraged to see the reality of the DPRK which is holding high the banner of socialism, foiling the moves of the imperialists, he added.
					
					 He wished Kim Jong Un good health and bigger success in his noble work.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from French Political Party Official
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from French Political Party Official
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a gift from Maurice Cukierman, international secretary of the Central Committee of the French Revolutionary Communist League, on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was handed to Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, by Maurice Cukierman on Friday.

articles.title: Russian Ambassador Hosts Reception on Anniversary of DPRK-Russia Diplomatic Relations
articles.content:
Russian Ambassador Hosts Reception on Anniversary of DPRK-Russia Diplomatic Relations
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Alexandr Timonin hosted a reception at his embassy on Friday to mark the 64th anniversary of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Russia.
					 Present there on invitation were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Myong San, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is also chairman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association, and other officials concerned.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid before Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid before Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Those who are taking part in the celebration events to mark the 65th anniversary of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School visited the statues of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il erected at the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces on Friday. 
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues in humble reverence and made bows to them.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations Leave
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations Leave
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian government delegation led by Viola Onwuliri, minister of State for Foreign Affairs, and the delegation of the China Institute of Contemporary International Relations headed by President Cui Liru left here for home on Friday.

articles.title: Servicepersons Launch Another River Improvement Project
articles.content:
Servicepersons Launch Another River Improvement Project
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons have turned out in the project for improving the Pothong River here after finishing the Hapjang River improvement project only in seven days.
					 This project is nearly three times the previous one in scale, including removal of sludge and repair of embankment and structures.
					
					 Upon receiving the order of Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), those servicepersons promptly set about the improvement project and are now working hard day and night to speed up the project.
					
					 They have already removed a large amount of sludge in two days after the start of the project.
					
					 The project site is vibrant with their militant mettle and songs.
					
					 Servicemen's families and other civilians joined the soldiers in the project, encouraging them with aid materials, dance and singing.
					
					 Kim Chol, a KPA officer, told KCNA:
					
					 "The project is vast, but we will finish it in the shortest period with the same offensive spirit as displayed during the Hapjang River improvement project."
					
					 Ri Song Nam, a non-commissioned officer, said:
					
					 "Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un entrusted us with this heavy yet honorable task.
					
					 What I have in mind is only to finish the project as early as possible and report it to the Supreme Commander."

articles.title: Progress Made in Dredging Pothong River and Improving Its Embankment
articles.content:
Progress Made in Dredging Pothong River and Improving Its Embankment
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Soldiers are pushing ahead with the project of dredging the Pothong River and improving its embankment.
					 The project envisages removing hundreds of thousands of cubic meters of sludge from the bottom of the river section extending more than ten kilometers, planting 60 000 trees, turfing tens of hectares of land and paving thousands of square meters of promenade with colorful flagstones.
					
					 The sludge removed by the soldiers for 24 hours from noon on Thursday accounted for 42 percent of the total amount.
					
					 Detailed measures have been taken to complete the project through three-dimensional and finish-one-by-one methods with all kinds of vehicles and forces.
					
					 The river banks are vibrant with courageous frontline-style agitation activities.
					
					 The soldiers are wading through sludge, carrying sacks of sludge on their backs.
					
					 The project has made progress by the devoted efforts made by the soldiers who are breaking through bottlenecks and difficulties in the spirit of thoroughly carrying out the leader's instructions, the spirit peculiar to the powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean "Government" for Bringing Inter-Korean Relations to Collapse
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean "Government" for Bringing Inter-Korean Relations to Collapse
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- It is possible to improve the inter-Korean relations, achieve peace of the Korean Peninsula and independently carve out the destiny of the nation only when the Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea rolls back its confrontation policy and honestly implements the north-south declarations. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a bylined article. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The north-south relations have been driven to the lowest ebb due to the anti-reunification moves of the south Korean conservative regime. 
					
					 The inter-Korean relations, which had favorably developed promoting reconciliation and cooperation, were put on such orbit of deterioration by the Lee group opposed to the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration. The "May 24 measures" taken by the Lee group under the pretext of its conspiratorial warship "Cheonan" sinking case totally blocked north-south cooperation and brought the inter-Korean relations back to those in the period before the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration. 
					
					 The south Korean regime leveled guns at the fellow countrymen in the north grieving over the great loss and ceaselessly perpetrated such hideous provocations as hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, driving the inter-Korean relations into the phase where they are beyond remedy. 
					
					 These relations can be brought back to a right track only when the confrontation policy of the south Korean conservative group is put to an end and the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration are respected. 
					
					 The DPRK will never allow anyone pursuing confrontation, quite contrary to the implementation of the declarations, but strongly react against him.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Raps U.S.-S. Korea "Missile Guidance Agreement"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Raps U.S.-S. Korea "Missile Guidance Agreement" 
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea recently announced "missile guidance agreement" with the U.S. It said that it can strike all parts of the DPRK from the middle area of south Korea. He ordered the military to quickly deploy ballistic missiles with heavier warheads and with longer range to be ready to go into action. In the meantime, the U.S. is zealously instigating the Lee regime to do so, claiming that its "missile guidance agreement" was an "absolutely appropriate measure."
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard: 
					
					 The publication of the "missile guidance agreement" by the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak puppet regime is obviously a grave military provocation against the DPRK and a clear revelation of their scenario for a war against it.
					
					 This clearly proves the conspiracy and tie-up between the U.S. and the Lee group seeking a preemptive attack on the DPRK has entered a very dangerous phase which allows no one to remain a passive onlooker to them.
					
					 The U.S. is making an effective use of such confrontation maniacs as Lee in carrying out its strategy of attaching importance to the Asia-Pacific. By meeting Lee's imploration for extending the strike range of ballistic missiles, the U.S. is seeking to put the puppet forces under its tighter control and use them as a shock brigade for igniting a war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The Lee group, finding itself in an abyss of ruin in the last period of its rule, is seeking a way out of the crisis in igniting a war. 
					
					 The Lee group's attempt to realize its ambition for invading the DPRK by extending the strike range of missiles would only precipitate its miserable doom.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces Japan's Moves to Grab Tok Islets
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces Japan's Moves to Grab Tok Islets
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the Japanese foreign minister at New York talks said the Tok islets are "inalienable part of Japan's territory and the issue of dominium over the islets should be handled by the International Court of Justice."
					 Moreover, a recent meeting of the international information liaison council held at the residence of the Japanese prime minister defined overseas information strategy on Tok islets as a new major task and decided to take measures to carry it out in the future.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is nothing but a brazen-faced action that can be perpetrated only by such wicked and shameless hoodlums of Japan.
					
					 Korea cannot but be enraged at the moves of the descendents of Samurais to build up public opinion in a bid to bring the issue of dominium over the islets up before the International Court of Justice, persistently insisting that the Tok islets are part of their territory. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are working hard to hype the "issue" of Tok islets as an international issue at a governmental level unlike the past when the issue was discussed at a non-governmental level. This behavior reminds one of barbarism committed by the Japanese aggressors against the Korean people more than a century back.
					
					 It is the scenario of Japan to launch a reinvasion of Korea under the pretext of the "issue" of Tok islets.
					
					 But the Japanese militarists should bear in mind that the Tok islets will always stand as inalienable part of Korea's territory.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never pardon the Japanese reactionaries if they keep to the wrong road, persistently raising a claim to the islets in a bid to realize their wild ambition for staging a comeback to Korea in denial and distortion of the historical and legal facts, warns the commentary.

articles.title: Papers Mark Anniversary of DPRK-Russia Diplomatic Ties
articles.content:
Papers Mark Anniversary of DPRK-Russia Diplomatic Ties
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Newspapers Friday dedicate bylined articles to the 64th anniversary of the establishment of DPRK-Russia diplomatic ties which are growing stronger as the days go by. 
					 The opening of diplomatic ties between the two countries on Oct. 12, 1948 ushered in a new era of the DPRK-Russia friendship.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says that the DPRK-Russia relations have steadily covered the road of their development on the principle of independence, mutual respect and noninterference in internal affairs and equality despite storm and stress of history. 
					
					 In this period the two countries have consolidated the bonds of friendship, closely cooperating with each other in various fields of politics, economy and culture, the paper says, and goes on:
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il made a more than 6,000 km-long journey to visit the Siberian and Far Eastern regions of Russia despite sultry weather in August 2011. This impressively tells about the undying feats of Kim Jong Il who devoted himself to developing the DPRK-Russia friendly relations on a new phase. 
					
					 Under the guidance of President Putin Russia is bringing about positive changes and successes in various fabrics of social life. The Korean people sincerely hope that the Russian people's efforts to achieve sovereignty and territorial integrity and build powerful Russia will yield fruits. 
					
					 Minju Joson says that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Russia with a good tradition will steadily grow stronger thanks to the energetic efforts of the peoples of the two countries to achieve common development and prosperity.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Confrontation Policy under Criticism
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Confrontation Policy under Criticism 
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- South Korean Internet paper Jaju Minbo on Oct. 5 posted a letter written by its Representative Ri Chang Gi behind bars in denunciation of the puppet regime's policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					 Ri in his letter referred to the growing criticism of the Lee Myung Bak regime's confrontation policy.
					
					 South Koreans of different social standings and experts on south-north relations call for "the lifting of the May 24 measures", saying "the one-sided hostile policy toward the north is problematic", Ri said. Even some conservatives claim that the blocking of dialogue with the north is problematic, he said, adding:
					
					 Nevertheless, the "government" let loose sophism that it is "a policy that taught a principle" without admitting its mistakes.
					
					 Ri said the present regime can never be a dialogue partner with the north, holding it is chiefly to blame for increasing the danger of war in the West Sea of Korea and other areas.
					
					 He urged the "government" to reflect on what it has done before the people, halt at once the crackdown on the reunification movement forces that urgently call for the development of the south-north relations and release all prisoners of conscience who are in jail on charges of violation of the "Security Law".
					
					 If it refuses to do so, it will always be cursed and denounced by the whole nation and the world conscience, he warned.

articles.title: S. Korean Figure Urges Japan to Pay for Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
S. Korean Figure Urges Japan to Pay for Its Past Crimes
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Hui Yong, permanent representative of the Citizens' Council with Grand Mothers of the "Volunteers Corps" of south Korea, made public an article on September 30 urging Japan to pay for the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past.
					 In an article Kim said many Korean women were taken away to Japan under the signboard of the "working volunteers corps" during the Japanese imperialist colonial rule and were forced to toil and moil in Japan without being paid for what they did and are now undergoing sufferings.
					
					 Mitsubishi Heavy Industries is a typical war criminal enterprise which forcibly took away more than 100 000 Koreans to coal mines, mines, ship yards, munitions factories, etc., Kim said, adding:
					
					 But it has neither admitted aggression and plunder of Korea nor made any apology and reparation for the crimes committed against humanity as is the case with the Japanese government.
					
					 Kim condemned Mitsubishi for shunning the settlement of its past crimes while making a mockery of the victims under the patronage of pro-Japanese Lee Myung Bak.
					
					 Kim recalled that civic organizations of south Korea and Japan have waged a protracted struggle against the war criminal enterprise of Japanese imperialism and recently launched a campaign for boycotting Mitsubishi products. 
					
					 The past crimes of the Japanese imperialists should be certainly liquidated to achieve justice and peace, Kim held, calling upon all circles to turn out in positive actions.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Indian, Nepalese Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Carried by Indian, Nepalese Papers
Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On the Fundamentals of Revolutionary Party Building" was carried by the Indian paper Indian and World Event on Oct. 5 and the Nepalese paper Charcha on Oct. 8.
					 The work, published on Oct. 10, 1992, clarifies the historical lessons drawn from the building of a ruling party under socialism, the fundamental principles for building a Juche-oriented revolutionary party and the idea of strengthening internationalist unity and solidarity among the revolutionary parties.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Marked in India, Czech Republic
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Marked in India, Czech Republic
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Various events were held in India and the Czech Republic on Oct. 4 and 5 to mark the15th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the 67th anniversary of the WPK and the 86th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					 They included a seminar, book and photo exhibition and film shows in India and a lecture and book and photo exhibition in the Czech Republic.
					
					 Present at those events were figures of the Indian Youth Group for the Study of Works of Comrade Kim Il Sung, the Juche Idea Study Society of Delhi, India, the Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea and the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association and masses.
					
					 Participants in the film shows watched Korean films on the Songun leadership feats of the great men of Mt. Paektu and their noble love for the people.
					
					 Balzor Singh Chauhan, chairman of the Indian Youth Group for the Study of Works of Comrade Kim Il Sung, said in a speech that the WPK has organized and guided all victories of the Korean people.
					
					 The WPK was founded by President Kim Il Sung, founder of socialist Korea, and was developed by leader Kim Jong Il, he said, and went on:
					
					 It will display its might as a steel-strong party as it has supreme leader Kim Jong Un as its first secretary.
					
					 B.C. Gupta, chairman of the Juche Idea Study Society of Delhi, India, noted: Kim Jong Il deemed it as his motto in his life to believe in the people as in Heaven. He set the improvement of the people's living standard as the supreme principle of party activities and made energetic efforts for its implementation.
					
					 Jaroslavc Kafka, chairman of the Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea, noted that the feats performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in party building are a precious legacy for the world socialist movement.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo and Fine Art Exhibitions Open in Russia
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo and Fine Art Exhibitions Open in Russia
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Korean book, photo and fine art exhibitions were held in Moscow City and Chita City of Zabaikal Territory of Russia on Oct. 2 and 5 to mark the 15th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, the 67th anniversary of the WPK and the first anniversary of Kim Jong Il's visit to the Siberian and Far Eastern regions of Russia.
					 Displayed on the front walls of the exhibition halls were portraits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. Floral baskets and bouquets were placed before them.
					
					 On display there were photos on the immortal revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il and his precious exploits.
					
					 Also displayed there were works of the peerlessly great men, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and fine art pieces reflecting creative wisdom and skills of Koreans.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremonies of the exhibitions were vice administrative governor of Sontsebo District of Moscow City, vice-minister for International Cooperation, Foreign Economic Ties and Tourism of the Zabaikal Territorial Government, public figures of relevant regions and masses. The DPRK ambassador and staff members of the DPRK missions were present there on invitation. 
					
					 There were speeches at the opening ceremonies.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle for Implementing Joint Declarations Supported by Foreign Social Bodies
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle for Implementing Joint Declarations Supported by Foreign Social Bodies 
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Social bodies of Democratic Congo and Germany made public statements on Oct. 4 on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of the historic October 4 declaration.
					 The Democratic Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association in a statement said that General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, paving a wide avenue for independently and peacefully reunifying the country by concerted efforts of the Koreans free from any foreign interference.
					
					 The statement recalled the dear respected Kim Jong Un in his historic speech on April 15 said that the DPRK would join hands with anyone who truly wants the reunification of the country and the peace and prosperity of the nation.
					
					 It called upon the world progressives to invariably extend support to the Korean people's cause of national reunification.
					
					 The German Branch of the Korean Friendship Association in its statement noted that the October 4 declaration indicated practical ways for turning the north-south relations into those of mutual respect and trust and ensuring detente and peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 However, the present south Korean authorities totally negated the October 4 declaration from the outset of their office and have pursued confrontation with the DPRK, creating a touch-and-go situation on the peninsula.
					
					 It urged the south Korean authorities to stop staging joint military drills with the U.S. and implement the north-south joint declarations.
					
					 It also called for defusing the tension on the peninsula and creating environment favorable for reunification.
					
					 It expressed positive support for the Korean people in their struggle to implement the declarations.

articles.title: Korean People's Reunification Movement Supported by Foreign Public Figures
articles.content:
Korean People's Reunification Movement Supported by Foreign Public Figures
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Public figures of Serbia and Myanmar released statements on Oct. 3 and 4 on the occasions of the 32nd anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK) and the fifth anniversary of the historic October 4 declaration.
					 Batrich Mijobich, general secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party, noted that the DFRK proposal and the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it, marked historic events of epochal significance in the history of the national reunification movement of the Korean people.
					
					 The world progressives fully support them, considering them as the most reasonable practical ways to bring earlier the independent reunification of Korea, he noted.
					
					 He strongly urged the U.S. and the south Korean authorities not to conduct any actions contrary to the desire of all Koreans for peace and reunification of the country.
					
					 Tin Tun, director of the Myanmar Homoetherapy Research Institute, referred to the undying feats the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed in the cause of national reunification.
					
					 He noted that Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, is wisely leading the Korean people to achieve the reunification of the country true to the behests of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Although the anti-reunification forces of south Korea are seeking to keep Korea divided into two parts forever, backed by foreign forces, the Korean people will surely accomplish the cause of national reunification under the leadership Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: October 4 Declaration Favored by Finnish, Danish Personages
articles.content:
October 4 Declaration Favored by Finnish, Danish Personages
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Finnish and Danish personages issued statements on the occasion of the fifth anniversary of the historic October 4 declaration.
					 Antti Sika Aho, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, said that the October 4 declaration is a historic one for achieving peace, prosperity and reunification of the Korean Peninsula along with the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					
					 He continued:
					
					 The June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration are milestones of Korea's reunification.
					
					 However, these historic declarations have not yet been implemented.
					
					 The provocations of the present chief executive of south Korea and the U.S. interference are pushing the inter-Korean ties to a more catastrophic phase.
					
					 The Finland-Korea Society fully supports the October 4 declaration.
					
					 Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, condemned the anti-reunification provocations of the Lee Myung Bak puppet regime.
					
					 If the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration had been properly implemented, such tension would not have been created on the Korean Peninsula, he noted, and continued:
					
					 Respecting and thoroughly implementing the north-south joint declarations is the only way for ensuring the lasting peace and achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the peninsula.
					
					 The progressive Danish people urge the Lee Myung Bak "government" to thoroughly implement the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Voice of Russia Accuses U.S. of Sparking Missile Race
articles.content:
Voice of Russia Accuses U.S. of Sparking Missile Race
 Pyongyang, October 12 (KCNA) -- Voice of Russia aired a commentary on Wednesday assailing the "declaration on missile policy" released by the south Korean puppet regime.
					 The commentary said:
					
					 The DPRK warned the aggressors that they would not be able to escape its missile strike. 
					
					 It declared that it can strike not only south Korea, the U.S. military bases in Japan but even the U.S. mainland.
					
					 This is a reaction of the DPRK to the decision made by the south Korean regime to extend the firing range of ballistic missiles up to 800 km.
					
					 An expert of the Institute of the Far East of the Russian Academy of Sciences said that the extension of the missile range by the south Korean regime will keep the whole area of the DPRK within the range of its strike, adding that is why the DPRK's reaction was entirely proper.
					
					 It continued:
					
					 The U.S. breached the system of the international missile technology proliferation this time by helping south Korea extend its missile range.
					
					 The U.S. is seeking its objective by sparking a new missile race on the Korean Peninsula. By allowing south Korea to extend its missile range it took another step against China. Now the south Korean missiles can strike even the depth of China.
					
					 The U.S. hinted that it can offer south Korea anti-air information available from a satellite and drones.
					
					 This is another plot to build a missile shield in East Asia.
					
					 The "missile threat" from the DPRK is nothing but a pretext to build this missile shield.

articles.title: Russian President Terms NATO Leftover of Cold War Era
articles.content:
Russian President Terms NATO Leftover of Cold War Era
 Moscow, October 11 (KCNA) -- Russian President Vladimir Putin recently branded NATO as a leftover of the Cold War era. 
					 He said he could not understand why NATO still exists, underscoring the need to turn NATO into a political body at an early date.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de respuesta de los lideres chinos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de respuesta de los lideres chinos
Pyongyang, 12 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC, recibieron un mensaje de respuesta que les dedicaran el dia 9 el Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China, Hu Jintao, el presidente del Comite Permanente de la Asamblea Popular Nacional de la Republica Popular China, Wu Bangguo y el primer ministro del Consejo de Estado, Wen Jiabao.
					El mensaje senala como sigue:
					
					Expresamos sincero agradecimiento a Uds. por el envio de la calurosa felicitacion formulada con motivo del 63o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPCh.
					
					La tradicional amistad China-Corea fue preparada y florecida por los Dirigentes de las generaciones veteranas de los dos paises, y una preciosa riqueza comun de ambos pueblos.
					
					Confiamos en que bajo la nueva epoca y situacion, se lograra de continuo el nuevo desarrollo en la amistad China-Corea llena de nueva vivacidad y animo para ofrecer mejores beneficios a ambos paises  y pueblos.
					
					Deseamos que Corea logre incesantes y nuevos exitos en todas las ramas.

articles.title: Escuelas revolucionarias acogen 65o aniversario de sus fundaciones
articles.content:
Escuelas revolucionarias acogen 65o aniversario de sus fundaciones
Pyongyang, 12 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 12 en la capitalina Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto por el 65o aniversario de la fundacion de la Escuela Revolucionaria de Mangyongdae y la Escuela Revolucionaria Kang Pan Sok.
					En la trayectoria de 65 anos dada por las escuelas estan reflejados la sabia direccion y el ardiente amor del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente            Kim Jong Il y la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk quienes dedicaron todos los suyos para crear la autoctona idea y tradicion de educar a los hijos de martires revolucionarios y formarlos como sucesores de la revolucion.
					
					En el acto participaron Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyong Hui y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los ex combatientes revolucionarios antijaponeses, los profesores, empleados y alumnos de escuelas revolucionarias y graduados.
					
					En la ocasion se dio lectura al mensaje "Los hijos de los martires revolucionarios deben ser fidedignos pilares de la revolucion del Songun que continuen firmemente el linaje de Mangyongdae y el del monte Paektu" enviado por el Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea Kim Jong Un a los profesores, empleados y alumnos de dichos planteles docentes en ocasion del 65 aniversario de su fundacion.
					
					En el acto se hicieron uso de la palabra.
					
					El director de la Escuela Revolucionaria de Mangyongdae O Ryong Thaek y otros oradores senalaron que el mensaje constituye una guia programatica a tomarse con firmeza en educar a los hijos de los martires revolucionarios hoy que ha entrado en una nueva etapa de viraje historico en el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y la bandera combativa que estimula la lucha por la victoria final de la potencia del monte Paektu.
					
					Subrayaron que en el mundo existen muchos hijos de los revolucionarios quienes sacrificaron sus vidas en aras de la liberacion, la libertad y la independencia, la prosperidad y el desarrollo de los  paises y naciones, pero, solo los hijos de martires revolucionarios de la Corea del Songun gozan de una vida digna y orgullosa en el regazo del Presidente y el Dirigente.
					
					Expresaron la decision de poner en la primera linea de la sagrada lucha por cumplir la causa del Juche, la revolucionaria del Songun iniciada en el monte Paektu en acato al historico mensaje del Comandante Supremo.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion de Kyodo
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con delegacion de Kyodo
Pyongyang, 12 de octubre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio el dia 12 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con la delegacion de la agencia noticiera Kyodo de Japon, encabezada por su presidente Satoshi Ishikawa. 
					En la ocasion, el jefe de la delegacion subrayo que gracias a la sabia direccion del Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea Kim Jong Un, quien continua magnificamente la causa del Secretario General del PTC Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Enfatizo que durante su visita a varios lugares, pudo confiar en el brillante futuro de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Expreso la voluntad de librar las actividades imparciales y objetivas para contribuir a la mejora de las relaciones Japon-Corea.

articles.title: Inaugurada XII Competencia Deportiva del Pueblo
articles.content:
Inaugurada XII Competencia Deportiva del Pueblo 
Pyongyang, 12 de octubre (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurada el dia 12 en el Estadio Kim Il Sung la XII Competencia Deportiva del Pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					  Esta vez se efectuan en la capital y otras localidades los juegos de futbol, baloncesto, voleibol, ping-pong, tenis, atletismo y otras variadas disciplinas divididos en las ramas de conjunto deportivo y el deporte masivo.
					
					  En la ceremonia inaugural estuvieron presentes Kim Yong Jin viceministro del Consejo de Ministros, Ri Yong Su, jefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y otros cuadros concernientes, asi como los funcionarios de los ministerios y organos centrales, los deportistas y trabajadores.
					
					  Kim Yong Jin dijo en su discurso de felicitacion que la Competencia Deportiva del Pueblo de este ano serviran de un motivo que manifestara con vigor la ferrea conviccion de todos los participantes de glorificar eternamente las hazanas de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il acumuladas en la rama deportiva y edificar la potencia de deportes en acato al alto proposito del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Pak Myong Chol, ministro de Deportes subrayo en su discurso inaugural la necesidad de avivar el  fervor de deportes en todo el pais con motivo del presente torneo y anadio que todos los jugadores deben demostrar sin reservas la habilidad ejercitada en los dias ordinarios y  de esta manera, crear nuevo record y nueva norma.
					
					  Terminado acto inaugural, tuvieron lugar el vuelo de maestria de los aeromodelistas y representacion ejemplar de los paracaidistas.

articles.title: CRPP publica la informacion no. 1012
articles.content:
CRPP publica la informacion no. 1012
Pyongyang, 12 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria divulgo el dia 12 la informacion no.1012 que sigue:
					Ultimamente, el traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak es condenado y criticado por los nacionales y extranjeros por sus injurias sobre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					El dia 4, en el ultimo "discurso de la politica ante la Asamblea Nacional" de su mandato, Lee dijo que "el desarrollo de arma nuclear y misil por el Norte (de Corea) es cosa intolerable" y "el Sur esta dispuesto a disuadir la provocacion del enemigo".
					
					El dia 8, invito a una orgia en Chongwadae a los elementos de la "Asociacion de Reservistas", entidad ultraderechista, y califico a la RPDC de "contraparte belicosa" anadiendo que ha llegado el "nuevo viento de apertura".
					
					Esos chismes demuestran la situacion agonica del maniaco de enfrentamiento, colmado de la conciencia hostil a la RPDC, y auguran el fin tragico de ese cadaver vivo.
					
					 Es muy ridiculo que el traidor Lee, condenado y denunciado por todos los coreanos por haber cometido infamias de toda indole durante su mandato, cuestionara a otro sin darse cuenta de su miserable condicion.
					
					Lo que hizo Lee en su mandato es bloquear el avance de la era del 15 de Junio mediante el enfrentamiento anti-RPDC, quebrar las relaciones intercoreanas que se desarrollaban favorablemente y dedicarse a la provocacion de guerra en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras con el fin de vulnerar la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y llevar la situacion a punto de guerra.
					
					Sobre todo, la recien publicada "declaracion de la politica de misil" destinada al ataque preventivo contra la RPDC evidencia que ya pasaron el limite alarmante las tentativas de provocar la guerra anti-RPDC de la banda traidora surcoreana.
					
					Sin embargo, hablando todavia de la "provocacion" de alguien, Lee dijo cinicamente que "aspira a las relaciones S-N de coexistencia y coprosperidad".
					
					A pesar de que ha convertido el Sur de Corea en la tierra privada de derechos humanos y democracia con su inaudita tirania fascista y politicas antipopulares y depauperado las condiciones de vida del pueblo, ese psicopata habla atrevidamente de la "apertura" de alguien.
					
					 Al injuriar a la RPDC, Lee quiso desahogarse de su enfado por haber sido aislado por dentro y por fuera debido al fracaso total de su politica conflictiva con la RPDC y gobernacion antipopular.
					
					Desde el primer dia de su llegada al poder, hablaba tanto del "poder moral", pero al final de su mandato, llego a ser blanco de investigacion especial al destaparse los actos de corrupcion.
					
					Al fomentar el enfrentamiento fratricida en visperas de elecciones presidenciales, Lee trata de estimular a las fuerzas conservadoras contraidas y hacer "aporte" a la retoma del poder del "Partido Saenuri", de modo que pueda evitar el encarcelamiento despues de su salida del poder.
					
					Todos los compatriotas sentenciaron al arruinamiento a Lee, dictador fascista, maniaco de confrontacion y traidor a la nacion.
					
					Si Lee intensifica sus actos de enfrentamiento anti-RPDC para mantener su vida sucia, seran cada vez mas fuertes el odio y la indignacion de los coreanos y mas implacable la sentencia de la historia.
					
					En este mundo no hay refugio para Lee Myung Bak, tristemente celebre como vendepatria, servil a las grandes potencias, conflictivo con los connacionales y dictador fascista.
